item.name: Number of network interfaces
item.description: The number of network interfaces (regardless of their current state) present on this system.

trigger_prototype.name: Unit-[{#SNMPINDEX}] CPU usage is above 60% for 5min
Unit-[{#SNMPINDEX}] CPU usage is above 80% for 5min

discovery_rule.name: Network Optical Modules Info
discovery_rule.description: Discovering interfaces from IF-MIB. Interfaces with down(2) Administrative Status are not discovered.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<={Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>={Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>-40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Muito Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalRxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01 and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneRxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>-40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Rx Power Muito Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxHighWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxLowWarnThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01) and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>-40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Baixo

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxHighThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Muito Alto

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}<{Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalTxLowThreshold[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} <> -0.01 and ({Template Huawei Switch S5700-S6700:hwEntityOpticalLaneTxPower[{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>-40)
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}: Tx Power Muito Baixo
